headline: Altria Group Inc. (NYSE:MO) Stands Out as a High-Yield Dividend Stock with Strong Fundamentals

headline: Altria’s Debt-Fueled Buybacks and Dividend Streak Could Be A Game Changer For Altria Group (MO)
summary: In recent months, Altria Group has extended its decades-long streak of dividend increases and expanded its share buyback program, even as it carries about US$25.70 billion in debt and reports shareholder equity of roughly US$3.50 billion, raising questions about how comfortably its sizeable cash returns are financed. At the same time, intensifying attention on U.S. efforts to curb unregulated disposable vapes and ongoing bearish options activity around upcoming earnings are sharpening...
